name: fe-organization-pc

scripts.sass: node initDomain && eslint src --fix && umi dev
scripts.portal: node initDomain && eslint src --fix && umi dev
scripts.work: node initDomain && eslint src --fix && umi dev
scripts.start: node initDomain && eslint src --fix && cross-env BUILD_ENV=local ALIAS_ENV=ceshi1 umi dev
scripts.start:w: node initDomain && eslint src --fix && cross-env BUILD_ENV=local ALIAS_ENV=w umi dev
scripts.start:jc: node initDomain && eslint src --fix && cross-env BUILD_ENV=local ALIAS_ENV=jc umi dev
scripts.start:merchant: node initDomain && eslint src --fix && cross-env BUILD_ENV=local ALIAS_ENV=merchant umi dev
scripts.start:enx: node initDomain && eslint src --fix && cross-env BUILD_ENV=local ALIAS_ENV=enx umi dev
scripts.start:egz: node initDomain && eslint src --fix && cross-env BUILD_ENV=local ALIAS_ENV=egz umi dev
scripts.dev: node initDomain && cross-env BUILD_ENV=dev ALIAS_ENV=global NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=4096 umi build
scripts.test: node initDomain && cross-env BUILD_ENV=test ALIAS_ENV=global NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=4096 umi build
scripts.pre: node initDomain && cross-env BUILD_ENV=pre ALIAS_ENV=global NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=4096 umi build
scripts.pro: node initDomain && cross-env BUILD_ENV=pro ALIAS_ENV=global NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=4096 umi build
scripts.analyze: cross-env ANALYZE=1 BUILD_ENV=pro ALIAS_ENV=global umi build
scripts.enroll: node initDomain && eslint src --fix && umi dev
scripts.portal-min: node initDomain && eslint src --fix && umi dev
scripts.min-portal: node initDomain && eslint src --fix && umi dev
scripts.min-work-portal: node initDomain && eslint src --fix && umi dev
scripts.enroll-min: node initDomain && eslint src --fix && umi dev
scripts.portal-user: node initDomain && eslint src --fix && umi dev
scripts.all: node initDomain && eslint src --fix && umi dev

#overrides说明#: 淘宝源path-to-regexp1.8.0版本与1.9.0版本错乱处理，勿删
